svg.content: <mxfile host="Electron" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) draw.io/28.1.2 Chrome/138.0.7204.243 Electron/37.4.0 Safari/537.36" version="28.1.2"> <diagram name="Page-1" id="Ay4aUZi0CpDkHKsU1VPy"> <mxGraphModel dx="1255" dy="838" grid="0" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="0" pageScale="1" pageWidth="827" pageHeight="1169" background="none" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="0" /> <mxCell id="1" parent="0" /> <mxCell id="Ssq0M91fAwEaB2shX0vr-1" value="" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="50" y="20" width="140" height="240" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Ssq0M91fAwEaB2shX0vr-2" value="<font style="font-size: 14px;">程序入口点</font>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;fillColor=none;strokeColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="55" y="25" width="80" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Ssq0M91fAwEaB2shX0vr-3" value="" style="endArrow=blockThin;html=1;rounded=0;endFill=1;" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint y="140" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="80" y="140" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Ssq0M91fAwEaB2shX0vr-4" value="<span style="font-size: 14px;">指令m</span>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;fillColor=none;strokeColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="55" y="115" width="45" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Ssq0M91fAwEaB2shX0vr-5" value="<span style="font-size: 14px;">指令m+1</span>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;fillColor=none;strokeColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="55" y="145" width="65" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Ssq0M91fAwEaB2shX0vr-7" value="<div style=""><span style="font-size: 14px; background-color: transparent;"><font style="color: rgb(0, 0, 0);">信号到达</font></span></div>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=center;fillColor=none;strokeColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-20" y="98" width="60" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Ssq0M91fAwEaB2shX0vr-10" value="<font style="font-size: 14px;">exit()</font>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;fillColor=none;strokeColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="55" y="235" width="40" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Ssq0M91fAwEaB2shX0vr-14" value="" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="300" y="70" width="140" height="140" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Ssq0M91fAwEaB2shX0vr-8" value="" style="endArrow=blockThin;html=1;rounded=0;endFill=1;dashed=1;" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="160" y="30" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="160" y="90" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Ssq0M91fAwEaB2shX0vr-9" value="<span style="font-size: 14px;">执行流</span>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=center;fillColor=none;strokeColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="165" y="50" width="20" height="65" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Ssq0M91fAwEaB2shX0vr-11" value="" style="endArrow=none;html=1;rounded=0;endFill=1;dashed=1;startArrow=none;startFill=0;" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="160" y="250" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="160" y="200" as="targetPoint" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="Ssq0M91fAwEaB2shX0vr-13" value="" style="endArrow=blockThin;html=1;rounded=1;dashed=1;endFill=1;curved=0;" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="160" y="90" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="240" y="110" as="targetPoint" /> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="160" y="140" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="2wYy751q4M9aas9HWRkw-1" value="" style="endArrow=none;html=1;rounded=1;endFill=1;dashed=1;curved=0;startArrow=blockThin;startFill=1;" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="160" y="200" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="240" y="170" as="targetPoint" /> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="160" y="140" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="2wYy751q4M9aas9HWRkw-2" value="" style="endArrow=blockThin;html=1;rounded=1;curved=0;dashed=1;endFill=1;" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="240" y="110" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="320" y="140" as="targetPoint" /> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="320" y="80" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="2wYy751q4M9aas9HWRkw-3" value="" style="endArrow=blockThin;html=1;rounded=1;curved=0;dashed=1;endFill=1;" parent="1" edge="1"> <mxGeometry width="50" height="50" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="320" y="140" as="sourcePoint" /> <mxPoint x="240" y="170" as="targetPoint" /> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="320" y="200" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="2wYy751q4M9aas9HWRkw-6" value="<font style="font-size: 16px;">主函数</font>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=center;fillColor=none;strokeColor=none;fontStyle=1" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="80" y="-10" width="80" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="2wYy751q4M9aas9HWRkw-7" value="<span style="font-size: 14px;"><font style="">内核代表进程调用信号处理函数&nbsp;</font></span>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;fillColor=none;strokeColor=none;fontColor=#000000;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="195" y="48" width="90" height="50" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="2wYy751q4M9aas9HWRkw-8" value="<font style="font-size: 14px;">return</font>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;fillColor=none;strokeColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="325" y="185" width="40" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="2wYy751q4M9aas9HWRkw-9" value="<span style="font-size: 14px;"><font style="">执行信号处理函数的代码</font></span>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;fillColor=none;strokeColor=none;fontColor=#000000;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="325" y="127" width="95" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="2wYy751q4M9aas9HWRkw-10" value="<span style="font-size: 14px;"><font style="">程序在</font></span>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;fillColor=none;strokeColor=none;fontColor=#000000;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="195" y="180" width="50" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="2wYy751q4M9aas9HWRkw-11" value="<font style="font-size: 16px;">①</font>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=center;fillColor=none;strokeColor=none;fontColor=#000000;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry y="118" width="20" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="2wYy751q4M9aas9HWRkw-12" value="<font style="font-size: 16px;">②</font>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=center;fillColor=none;strokeColor=none;fontColor=#000000;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="195" y="100" width="20" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="2wYy751q4M9aas9HWRkw-13" value="<font style="font-size: 16px;">③</font>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=center;fillColor=none;strokeColor=none;fontColor=#000000;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="325" y="110" width="20" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="2wYy751q4M9aas9HWRkw-15" value="<font style="font-size: 16px;">④</font>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=center;fillColor=none;strokeColor=none;fontColor=#000000;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="195" y="160" width="20" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="2wYy751q4M9aas9HWRkw-17" value="<span style="font-size: 14px;"><font style="">中断点恢复</font></span>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=left;fillColor=none;strokeColor=none;fontColor=#000000;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="195" y="198" width="80" height="20" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="2wYy751q4M9aas9HWRkw-18" value="<font style="font-size: 16px;">信号处理函数</font>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;align=center;fillColor=none;strokeColor=none;fontStyle=1" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="320" y="40" width="100" height="30" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="2wYy751q4M9aas9HWRkw-20" value="<font style="font-size: 20px;">信号传递和处理函数执行</font>" style="text;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];autosize=1;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="89" y="270" width="240" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>
